Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #90 Harlem Reroute near North Blvd /Harlem
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted near North Blvd /Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Washington, Maple, Randolph, Harlem, and resume normal route: due to, street blockage near North Blvd /Harlem.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #201 Central/Ridge Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Church/Benson
ShortDescription: Eastbound 201 Central/Ridge buses are temporarily rerouted via Church, Maple, Emerson, Elgin and Chicago: due to, a festival near Church/Benson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #201 Central/Ridge buses are temporarily rerouted via Church, Maple, Emerson, Elgin, Chicago and over regular route: due to, a festival near Church/Benson.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays in both directions due to signal problem at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time. Service is resuming,

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays in both directions due to signal problem at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays.
